tasks.title: Add task timeline
tasks.description: Make a timeline tab. The GanttModel class extends QAbstractTableModel to manage and display tasks in a table format, where each row represents a task and each column represents a day in the project's timeline. The model will determin the project's start and end dates dynamically by analyzing task dates, then give each task a colored background corresponding to its status category (e.g., "Backlog," "To Do," etc.), as defined in STATUS_COLORS. The TimelineTab class acts as a container for a QTableView, displaying the Gantt chart using the GanttModel. It also enables users to view task details by double-clicking on a task row, opening a TaskDialog in read-only mode. The timeline automatically adjusts when tasks are updated, ensuring that new data is reflected in the UI upon refresh.
